My pleasure, guys!

Since there seemed to be a good bit of interest in this torrent, I'll get to work digitizing two other VHS bootleg/rarities type affairs which are in my possession (entitled "Zappa Interviews" and "Zappa On TV").

Should be up in a week or so!

"November 2, 1993-two days before his death!"

Perhaps you should review your Zappa history since Frank died on December 4th, which obviously is not two days after November 2nd.
